# PdfPixels — Complete Documentation

> Free online image and PDF processing tools. Compress, resize, convert images and manage PDFs — no registration required.

## Platform Overview

PdfPixels is a free, web-based image and PDF processing platform available at https://www.pdfpixels.com. The platform provides 55+ professional tools that work directly in the browser. No software installation is required, and no registration or account creation is needed.

Key features:
- **100% free** with no hidden costs or subscriptions
- **No watermarks** on any output files
- **No registration** required to use any tool
- **Privacy-first**: All files automatically deleted within 1 hour
- **Secure**: 256-bit SSL encryption for all transfers
- **GDPR compliant**: Full data protection compliance
- **Cross-platform**: Works on desktop, tablet, and mobile browsers

## Image Processing Tools

### Compression & Resizing
- **Compress Image** — Reduce image file size while maintaining visual quality. Supports target file sizes (10KB, 20KB, 50KB, 100KB, custom). Formats: JPG, PNG, WebP, HEIC, GIF, BMP.
  - URL: https://www.pdfpixels.com/tools/compress-image
- **Resize Image (Pixels)** — Change image dimensions to exact pixel values. Lock aspect ratio or set custom width/height.
  - URL: https://www.pdfpixels.com/tools/resize-image
- **Increase Image Size** — Increase image file size in KB to meet minimum upload requirements.
  - URL: https://www.pdfpixels.com/tools/increase-image-size-in-kb
- **Passport Photo Maker** — Auto-crop and resize to official passport/visa photo dimensions (2x2 inches, 35x45mm, etc.)
  - URL: https://www.pdfpixels.com/tools/passport-size-photo

### Cropping
- **Crop Image** — Crop to custom dimensions, square, or freehand shapes.
  - URL: https://www.pdfpixels.com/tools/crop-image
- **Circle Crop** — Crop images into perfect circles with transparent background.
  - URL: https://www.pdfpixels.com/tools/circle-crop
- **Square Crop** — Crop images to perfect 1:1 square ratio.
  - URL: https://www.pdfpixels.com/tools/square-image-cropper
- **Freehand Crop** — Draw a custom shape to crop with precision.
  - URL: https://www.pdfpixels.com/tools/freehand-crop

### Basic Editing
- **Rotate Image** — Rotate images by any angle (90°, 180°, 270°, custom).
  - URL: https://www.pdfpixels.com/tools/rotate-image
- **Flip Image** — Flip images horizontally or vertically.
  - URL: https://www.pdfpixels.com/tools/flip-image
- **Add Watermark** — Add text or logo watermarks with customizable opacity and position.
  - URL: https://www.pdfpixels.com/tools/watermark-image
- **Add Text to Image** — Overlay text on images with font, size, and color options.
  - URL: https://www.pdfpixels.com/tools/add-text-to-image
- **Add Logo to Image** — Overlay your logo with position and opacity control.
  - URL: https://www.pdfpixels.com/tools/add-logo-to-image
- **Join Images** — Combine multiple images side by side or stacked vertically.
  - URL: https://www.pdfpixels.com/tools/join-images-online
- **Split Image** — Split an image into a grid of equal parts. Perfect for Instagram grids.
  - URL: https://www.pdfpixels.com/tools/image-splitter
- **Image Color Picker** — Extract HEX, RGB & HSL color codes from any image.
  - URL: https://www.pdfpixels.com/tools/color-code-from-image

### Effects & Filters
- **Blur Image** — Apply Gaussian blur effect to images with adjustable intensity.
  - URL: https://www.pdfpixels.com/tools/blur-image
- **Blur Background** (AI) — Keep subject sharp, blur the rest using AI.
  - URL: https://www.pdfpixels.com/tools/blur-background
- **Blur Face** (AI) — Auto-detect and blur faces for privacy protection.
  - URL: https://www.pdfpixels.com/tools/blur-face
- **Pixelate Image** — Add pixelation / mosaic effect to images or specific areas.
  - URL: https://www.pdfpixels.com/tools/pixelate-image
- **Grayscale Image** — Convert color images to professional grayscale tones.
  - URL: https://www.pdfpixels.com/tools/grayscale-image
- **Black & White** — High-contrast black and white conversion with threshold control.
  - URL: https://www.pdfpixels.com/tools/turn-image-to-black-and-white
- **Sepia Filter** — Apply warm vintage sepia tone to images.
  - URL: https://www.pdfpixels.com/tools/sepia-filter
- **Invert Colors** — Create a negative image by inverting all colors.
  - URL: https://www.pdfpixels.com/tools/invert-image-colors
- **Motion Blur** — Add directional motion blur for dynamic action shots.
  - URL: https://www.pdfpixels.com/tools/motion-blur
- **Censor Photo** — Blur, pixelate, or black-bar sensitive areas of images.
  - URL: https://www.pdfpixels.com/tools/censor-photo
- **Pixel Art Converter** — Transform any photo into retro-style pixel art.
  - URL: https://www.pdfpixels.com/tools/picture-to-pixel-art
- **Beautify Image** (AI) — AI portrait enhancement: smooth skin, brighten eyes.
  - URL: https://www.pdfpixels.com/tools/beautify-image
- **Retouch Photo** (AI) — AI removes blemishes, spots, and imperfections.
  - URL: https://www.pdfpixels.com/tools/retouch-photo

### DPI & Quality
- **DPI Converter** — Convert image DPI to 72, 96, 150, 200, 300, or 600 for print or web use.
  - URL: https://www.pdfpixels.com/tools/convert-dpi
- **AI Upscale Image** — Increase image resolution up to 4x using AI without quality loss.
  - URL: https://www.pdfpixels.com/tools/upscale-image

### AI-Powered Tools
- **Background Remover** — Automatically detect subjects and remove backgrounds. Outputs transparent PNG.
  - URL: https://www.pdfpixels.com/tools/remove-image-background
- **AI Image Enhancer** — AI-powered quality improvement for lighting, colors, and sharpness.
  - URL: https://www.pdfpixels.com/tools/increase-image-quality

### Format Conversion
- **PNG to JPEG** — Convert PNG images to JPEG format with quality control.
  - URL: https://www.pdfpixels.com/tools/png-to-jpeg
- **JPEG to PNG** — Convert JPEG images to PNG format with transparency support.
  - URL: https://www.pdfpixels.com/tools/jpeg-to-png
- **WebP to JPG** — Convert WebP images to widely-compatible JPG format.
  - URL: https://www.pdfpixels.com/tools/webp-to-jpg
- **HEIC to JPG** — Convert iPhone HEIC/HEIF photos to JPG format.
  - URL: https://www.pdfpixels.com/tools/heic-to-jpg
- **Image to Text (OCR)** — Extract text from images using optical character recognition. 100+ languages.
  - URL: https://www.pdfpixels.com/tools/image-to-text

### Signature Tools
- **Signature Maker** — Draw, type, or upload a signature. Export as transparent PNG.
  - URL: https://www.pdfpixels.com/tools/generate-signature
- **Resize Signature** — Resize signature images to exact dimensions.
  - URL: https://www.pdfpixels.com/tools/resize-signature
- **Merge Photo & Signature** — Combine passport photo and signature into a single image.
  - URL: https://www.pdfpixels.com/tools/merge-photo-and-signature

### Metadata Tools
- **View Metadata** — Read EXIF, IPTC, and XMP metadata from images.
  - URL: https://www.pdfpixels.com/tools/photo-metadata-viewer
- **Edit Metadata** — Modify image metadata fields.
  - URL: https://www.pdfpixels.com/tools/photo-exif-editor
- **Remove Metadata** — Strip all metadata from images for privacy.
  - URL: https://www.pdfpixels.com/tools/remove-image-metadata

## PDF Processing Tools

### Merge & Split
- **Merge PDF** — Combine multiple PDF files into a single document. Supports drag-to-reorder.
  - URL: https://www.pdfpixels.com/tools/merge-pdf
- **Split PDF** — Extract specific pages or split into individual PDF files.
  - URL: https://www.pdfpixels.com/tools/split-pdf

### Compression & Conversion
- **Compress PDF** — Reduce PDF file size while maintaining readability.
  - URL: https://www.pdfpixels.com/tools/compress-pdf
- **Image to PDF** — Convert one or more images into a PDF document.
  - URL: https://www.pdfpixels.com/tools/image-to-pdf
- **PDF to JPG** — Convert PDF pages to high-quality JPG or PNG images.
  - URL: https://www.pdfpixels.com/tools/pdf-to-jpg

### PDF Editing
- **Rotate PDF** — Rotate PDF pages by 90°, 180°, or 270°.
  - URL: https://www.pdfpixels.com/tools/rotate-pdf
- **PDF Watermark** — Add text or image watermarks to PDF pages.
  - URL: https://www.pdfpixels.com/tools/add-watermark-pdf
- **Reorder PDF Pages** — Drag and drop to rearrange pages within a PDF.
  - URL: https://www.pdfpixels.com/tools/reorder-pdf-pages
- **Delete PDF Pages** — Remove specific pages from a PDF.
  - URL: https://www.pdfpixels.com/tools/delete-pdf-pages
- **Protect PDF** — Add password protection to PDF files.
  - URL: https://www.pdfpixels.com/tools/protect-pdf
- **Unlock PDF** — Remove password protection from PDF files.
  - URL: https://www.pdfpixels.com/tools/unlock-pdf

## File Format Support

### Input Formats
JPG, JPEG, PNG, WebP, HEIC, HEIF, GIF, BMP, TIFF, AVIF, PDF

### Output Formats
JPG, PNG, WebP, PDF

### File Size Limits
- Images: Up to 100MB per file
- PDF: Up to 500MB per file

## Privacy & Security

- All files processed with 256-bit SSL encryption
- Files automatically deleted within 1 hour of processing
- GDPR compliant data handling
- No file storage or indexing
- No user tracking beyond anonymous analytics
- Client-side processing for many tools (files never leave user's device)

## API

PdfPixels offers a free public API for programmatic image and PDF processing.
- API Documentation: https://www.pdfpixels.com/api-docs
- OpenAPI Specification: https://www.pdfpixels.com/openapi.yaml

## Frequently Asked Questions

**Q: Is PdfPixels free?**
A: Yes, PdfPixels is 100% free. All 55+ tools are available at no cost with no registration required. There are no hidden fees, subscriptions, or watermarks.

**Q: How do I compress an image online?**
A: Go to https://www.pdfpixels.com/tools/compress-image, upload your image (JPG, PNG, WebP, HEIC), select your desired quality or target file size, and download the compressed result instantly.

**Q: How do I merge PDF files?**
A: Visit https://www.pdfpixels.com/tools/merge-pdf, upload multiple PDF files, drag to reorder if needed, click merge, and download the combined PDF.

**Q: Is my data safe?**
A: Yes. Files are processed with 256-bit SSL encryption and automatically deleted within 1 hour. We never store, share, or access your content.

**Q: What file formats are supported?**
A: We support JPG, JPEG, PNG, WebP, HEIC, GIF, BMP, TIFF, AVIF for images and PDF for documents.

**Q: Does it work on mobile?**
A: Yes, PdfPixels is fully responsive and works on all devices including iPhone, Android, and tablets. No app installation needed.

**Q: How do I remove an image background?**
A: Use the Background Remover tool at https://www.pdfpixels.com/tools/remove-image-background. Upload your image and AI will automatically detect the subject and remove the background, producing a transparent PNG.
